About.paragraph: MedScapper is a user friendly Scapping Site which provides you all information for same medicine across all sites. user can set alert for price update for particular medicine.

Services.name: Fast Information
Services.text: we are giving all the required information about medicine very quickly from different sites.

Services.name: Price Alert
Services.text: we are providing email notification in order to get update about price of different medicines.

Services.name: Auto Suggestion
Services.text: we made seach easy by providing auto suggestion for user seaches.
